import React, { useState } from "react"; import { useNavigate } from "react-router-dom"; import {useDispatch} from 'react-redux'; import './changePassword.css' const RegisterReceptionist = () => { const initialState = { oldPassword: '', newPassword: '' ,cnfrmNewPassword:''}; const [formData, setFormData] = useState(initialState); const dispatch=useDispatch(); const navigate = useNavigate(); const handleChange= (e)=>{ setFormData({...formData,[e.target.name]:e.target.value}) } const handlePassword=()=>{ console.log(formData) } return ( <>
Change Password
Old Password
New Password
New Password
) } export default RegisterReceptionist
